name: BADA BING
description:
[THIS IS A EARLY BUILD]

(Submitted to "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again)" Jam)

A pair of dysfunctional mobsters are sent to extort a unassuming duck farmer, in a rural town far from the city. But as the duo enters the town to take their ill-gotten gains, a more ominous force emerges...

CONTROLS:

Movement: Arrow Keys / WASD

Interact: Space Bar / Enter

Equip / Alternate Items: J and K / Z and X

Unequip Items: L / C

NOT SURE WHAT TO DO?

I wrote a mini walk-through as a txt file, feel free to check it out in downloads if you need help!

CREDITS:

Game by beetosu

Fire animation by WrathGames Studio

"Country Ambiance" by CastleofSamples
